position: Senior Full Stack Developer & Tech Lead
description: Lead a team of 8 engineers in developing and scaling customer-facing web applications serving 1.5M+ active users with 99.9% uptime
Architect and implement microservices infrastructure using Node.js, TypeScript, and AWS, reducing API response time by 45% and increasing system throughput by 60%
Spearhead adoption of modern development practices including CI/CD pipelines, automated testing (95% code coverage), and infrastructure as code
Mentor junior developers through code reviews, pair programming sessions, and technical workshops, resulting in 40% faster onboarding time
Collaborate with product, design, and stakeholders to define technical roadmap and deliver features that increased user engagement by 35%
Established coding standards, best practices, and documentation that improved team velocity by 25%
